      MathSoc Problem Sheets

      These are problem sheets I made for my school maths society, aimed at sixth-formers (i.e. students in their last two years of school.)
      The problems are taken from a variety of sources, including V. V. Prasolov’s Problems in Plane Geometry and various UKMT Handbooks.

      2016-2017

      Induction
      Geometry 1: Triangles
      Geometry 2: Circles
      Graph Theory
      Geometry 3: Similarity
      Geometry 4: Inversion
      Geometry 5: Inversion 2 - Harder Problems
      Geometry 6: Plane Isometries

      2017-2018

      Modular Arithmetic
      Catalan Numbers
      The Pigeohole Principle
      Combinatorial Invariants
      Logic Puzzles
      Conic Sections
      Inequalities 1
      Inequalities 2: The Rearrangement Inequality
      Helly’s Theorem
